extendedInfo.description: Find out your device sensorsA fantastic tool! Know what sensors your device has! Now you can know if you have acceleration sensor, or compass, and so on. Very useful tool to know more about your own device.For instance, a Samsung Galaxy y has:1. Acceleration2. Magnetic sensor3. Combo orientation sensor4. Proximity sensor5. Gravity sensor6. Linear Acceleration sensor7. Rotation vector sensorIf this simple cell phone has it all, find out what yours have. It is always nice to know.
